Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text: 10 ll. on recto, list of 12 witnesses on verso. Dated day 2(?), month of Thoth of Ptolemy Philometor. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Lease of land for the harvest months by Amenhotep son of Hor to ... Scribe. Amenhotep son of Twot".
Curator's comments: Publ. Reich, u.s. p.77 pl. XV.XVI.XVIII. Bibliography Martin C.J., Ptolemaic Demotic land leases, in J.G. Keenan, J.G. Manning, U. Yiftach-Firanko (eds.), Law and Legal Practice in Egypt from Alexander to the Arab Conquest. A selection of Papyrological Sources in Translation, with Introductions and Commentary. Cambridge, 2014, p. 355-58. Felber, H., Demotische Ackerpachtverträge (ÄA 58). Wiesbaden, 1997, p. 7-15, 99, 111, 120-1, 215. Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Bibliographic references: Felber 1997 / Demotische Ackerpachtverträge der Ptolemäerzeit : Untersuchungen zu Aufbau, Entwicklung und inhaltlichen Aspekten einer Gruppe von demotischen Urkunden (7-15)
Reich 1914 / Papyri juistischen Inhalts in hieratischer und demotischer Schrift aus dem British Museum (p.77-82, pl.15-6, 18)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (43339) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/43339)
